title: safe-py-runner {{tag}}
description:
Release notes for {{tag}}.

- Added configurable policy defaults via `src/safe_py_runner/default_policy.toml`.
- Added two policy modes: `allow` and `restrict` for imports, builtins, and globals.
- Added policy file loading support with `run_code(..., policy_file=...)` and `RunnerPolicy.from_file(...)`.
- Added regression tests for policy modes and policy-file behavior (`tests/test_policy_modes.py`).
- Removed unused `RestrictedPython` dependency and refreshed lockfile.
- Expanded README with practical examples and gotchas (modes, policy files, I/O, limits, SystemExit).
- Added `CHANGELOG.md` and moved PyPI-specific docs to `docs/README_PYPI.md` with `docs/README.md` as a docs index.
- Removed tracked cache artifacts under `tests/__pycache__`.
